channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Windows 7 SP1
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Windows 7 SP1

item.title: CVE-2017-11819|2024-09-17T04:28:47.265Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20windows%207%20sp1
item.description: Microsoft Windows 7 SP1 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user, due to how Microsoft browsers handle objects in memory, aka "Windows Shell Remote Code Execution Vulnerability".
